title: 018: Bonus Episode: Squirrels & Sparkly Taints
description: Who can get enough of Adam's personal grooming habits? Apparently we can't! If French tips weren't enough, in this episode Justin shares his story of doing battle with a band of invading squirrels and the conversation soon degrades into a candid discussion about Adam's personal hygiene.
